countriesFacts.name: India
countriesFacts.fact: India is the most populous country in the world with a population of 1.3 billion

countriesFacts.name: United States
countriesFacts.fact: The United States of America is the world's second largest country by population, with over 329 million residents

countriesFacts.name: Brazil
countriesFacts.fact: Brazil is the world's fifth largest country by population, with a population of 210 million people

countriesFacts.name: Russia
countriesFacts.fact: Russia is the world's third largest country by population, with a population of 146 million people

countriesFacts.name: China
countriesFacts.fact: China is the world's most populous country, with a population of 1.4 billion people

countriesFacts.name: Pakistan
countriesFacts.fact: Pakistan is the world's fifth most populous country, with a population of 216 million people
